attributes.action: hold the judiciary accountable in familycourt for sending kids to unsafe contact
attributes.additional_details:
Claire Throssell

‘He saw our children as possessions': my husband killed our sons
Claire Throssell’s sons were burnt to death by her husband. Now she is campaigning to help prevent others suffering as she has

Michelle Rawlins

Sat 7 Apr 2018 01.00 EDT

Like many parents, Claire Throssell carries her sons’ sports gear in the back of her car. Paul’s running trainers and Jack’s PE kit sit in the boot – but they have been there for a long time. For three and a half years, in fact:
attributes.background: victims of domestic violence and their children are been ignored,PD12J is not been followed putting thousands of victims and their children in danger.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. The courts are independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

If you would like the law changed you could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like to happen.
